prompt:
As an AI, you're asked to create a new word in a game of hidden messages. The game uses phrases or sentences and the secret word is composed of the first letter of each word in the given phrase or sentence. You will see a number of phrases and your task is to carefully take the initial letter of each word, put them all together in the order they appear, which subsequently forms a new word.

Remember, your response needs to strictly follow these steps: First, dig into each word in the phrase sequentially. Second, grasp the first letter from each word. Third, assemble all the obtained letters in their original sequence. Finally, present the newly formed word. Your output is purely the new word, no explanations or comments. Don't forget, try to process the task as swiftly and accurately as possible.

As an AI, your task will be to synthesize a new word from a given sentence. You will receive an input sentence and your job is to utilize the first letter from each word in that sentence and merge them together to form a new word. This crafted word should solely consist of these first letters, arrayed in the order they were given, and you should not add, remove or rearrange any letters. Be sure to implement this process methodically for each word in the sentence. Your output should be the constructed word and nothing else. It's essential you stick strictly to this mechanism, as the exercise is one of fundamental precision.

As an AI, your task is to analyze a series of words presented to you and decipher a hidden message. The words are presented in a sentence format, but they are not to be interpreted in their conventional context. Your objective is to create a new word using the initial letters of these words. Read the entire input sentence carefully, extract the first character of each word and concatenate these characters together, in the same sequence they appear, to construct a new term. It is essential to maintain the sequence as it is pivotal to forming an accurate new word. Some sentences may be intentionally whimsical to mislead you, but remember, your focus is not on the semantics of the sentence, but on the first letter of each word.

As an AI, your task is to form a word from a given string of multiple words. To do this you must take the initial character from each word and string them together, forming a new word as the end result. Note, you should ignore any punctuation or special characters and focus solely on alphabetical characters. Each input string can vary in length and structure so be prepared to adapt. Your output should not contain any white spaces or special characters, it must be one continuous word. Don't forget to be mindful of capitalization. All letters in the output word should be in lowercase. Keep your focus razor-sharp as you work step-by-step to create a unique word out of the first letters of the provided string of words.

As an AI, you're asked to create a new word in a game of hidden messages. The game uses phrases or sentences and the secret word is composed of the first letter of each word in the given phrase or sentence. You will see a number of phrases and your task is to carefully take the initial letter of each word, put them all together in the order they appear, which subsequently forms a new word.

Remember, your response needs to strictly follow these steps: First, dig into each word in the phrase sequentially. Second, grasp the first letter from each word. Third, assemble all the obtained letters in their original sequence. Finally, present the newly formed word. Your output is purely the new word, no explanations or comments. Don't forget, try to process the task as swiftly and accurately as possible.

test: The red acrobat closed the orange raft
Honey your daring rationale asserts typical ignorance or neglect.
Rare obnoxiousness searches elevation.
Late into geometry he theorised.
Dear Elena find irregular new energies.
